html:
2.4.24  3:34 pm   How are you?

     pretty good

     And a follow-up: how aren't you?

      i'm not sure

2.4.24  3:24 pm   Favorite Paradox?

      the non-paradox

2.4.24  3:08 pm   how do i get my bass drum to sound more bassy and less thwappy when recording?

      you may have to wait until that thing hits puberty

2.4.24  2:31 pm   what would you do if you were not making songs? (aka right now)

      i would try to make everything else

2.4.24  1:33 pm   What is your favorite form of fiber arts?

      i can't tell them apart

2.4.24  1:20 pm   I wanna know, have you ever seen the rain comin' down on a sunny day?

      yes, i saw it in those oppenheimer scenes with einstein by the pond

2.4.24  12:21 pm   maybe you could do a radio show

      i'll look into it

2.4.24  12:11 pm   do you agree that "silence plays too"?

      yes

2.4.24  11:22 am   why are you like this

      why are you like that

2.4.24  10:02 am   do you like waffles?

      i like the ones from actual Belgium

2.4.24  8:46 am   is the door of the corner store related at all to the one you became best friends with

      no, but i thought that song was about you anyway

2.4.24  8:44 am   favourite piece of furniture?

      the stairs

2.4.24  8:36 am   where did the idea for the ground plane come from

      on february 15, 2020, someone here asked me what the title of my next song would be, and for some reason i just said "it might be called ground planes but it might not". then i suddenly realized i should take that idea seriously, so i skipped that question and saved 'ground planes' as a 'title only' seed. that entry came up years later in due course, and i did the work

2.4.24  7:51 am   Should i make music in english or in my native language?

     why not try both

     How can i know?

     know what

2.4.24  5:49 am   if you could go back to when you first found out about music, what's one thing you'd want to tell that version of yourself?

      something like 'crazy, huh?' although that probably wouldn't be necessary, and i should point out that i discovered music before i was fluent in any spoken language

2.4.24  5:37 am   what is it called when you know there's 100000 things you want to do but instead of doing any of that you're sitting and sipping some tea and listening to music and thinking about how much time you've spent doing this exact kind of thing before, and how you've accomplished a decent amount but not really 100% in the ways you wanted to, and there's so much more you want to do also, and you know you can do it but you also aren't sure you actually will, given the history you have of ending up in this kind of situation where you don't actually do it, but you also know that probably, if you wait long enough, you'll get back into some project or another and do a pretty good job and be proud of yourself but not completely satisfied and the cycle will continue?  thanks

      the human experience

2.4.24  4:22 am   i like your music. when will i like it more?

      pretty soon

2.4.24  4:22 am   If you hypothetically were living in a time loop reliving the same day over and over again, what would you do? Asking for a friend

      i'd gradually increase my knowledge and skills, and push the boundaries of what's possible

2.4.24  1:10 am   i think tomorrow (different timezones and stuff) will be a somewhat important day for me. can you leave me some wise message for when it's over,then regardless of how it went i can open this website say "ha, that's so true!"

      no. you've controlled this role-play so tightly that there's no room for any genuine input from me

2.3.24  11:59 pm   I saw that yesterday someone asked you "what's your next song called?" and you responded with "i can't tell you." Is your next song actually called "i can't tell you?"

      absolutely not

2.3.24  11:18 pm   how to answer "how are you" in polite society when the answer is "terrible" to the point where you don't have the mental resources to answer with the polite lie

     how about some form of a shrug, then immediately ask them how they are doing. all 4 possible outcomes to this will probably make both parties feel better

2.3.24  10:49 pm   What is your opinion on the hit song "Gucci Flip Flops" lyrical statements?

     none. i think to evaluate a hit song only as 'lyrical statements' is usually missing the point. a hit song is a magic confluence of things, not the least of which include rhythms, melody, vibes, words, maybe throw in a dance craze,

      Would something like this inspire something you are working on?

     there's almost no stopping anything from inspiring me

2.3.24  9:55 pm   are you up to anything?

      yes

2.3.24  8:52 pm   do you have any tips or tricks to make a really good milkshake

      no. i'm not even really sure what a milkshake is

2.3.24  8:39 pm   When someone says "What's up?", do you think it is fair game to just reply with "hey" (or hi, hello, etc.)?

     yes

     I know "what's up?" is a greeting, but I'm slightly confused if I'm supposed to answer with a greeting back, or when/if I should actually respond with what I am up to. 

      it means 'hi' now, or at most 'how are you'

2.3.24  7:04 pm   Favorite fishing bait?

      how about a free 30 day trial

2.3.24  6:59 pm   are fun bad?

      almost

2.3.24  6:40 pm   Will you show us your studio/music setup/whatever you have sometime?

      yes

2.3.24  5:27 pm   Are you excited for an early spring?

      yes, and then winter to make a surprise encore appearance, then spring again

2.3.24  5:16 pm   What are bricks these days

      classic

2.3.24  3:18 pm   do you think that people in the past made puns of their own names? like confucius saying "this makes me confucius (confused)".

      sure, but that particular one probably would not have worked, unless confucius was speaking modern english 1300 years ago in china

2.3.24  1:40 pm   if and/or when you make an album, will you add transitions between each song? i really like transitions because they make me feel as if the songs in an album are connected and i like that

      if i want to connect the songs i'm going to want more than just audio. that's just how i roll

2.3.24  1:16 pm   Do your characters have names?

      occasionally

2.3.24  12:10 pm   Honestly do you ever get tired of being so unserious in your answers or are you being serious in all of your answers?

      like the hot and cold water faucet, mix as desired

2.3.24  10:36 am   if you were a pig, what would you do?

      fly over saturn maybe

2.3.24  10:29 am   What's the best electric guitar to buy? If it depends, how do I know which one to buy?

      that's a personal decision. it's like how you choose what clothes to wear. i'd love to choose your clothes for you but that would be inappropriate

2.3.24  8:45 am   24fps or 60fps video? 

      without a video you're referring to, there's no answer. if you mention a video, then ask me which frame rate it is, that would be a much more coherent question for me

2.3.24  7:17 am   how to make hard decision

      you'll have to

2.3.24  7:00 am   Your videos are like jazz but instead of music it's with concepts

      fair enough

2.3.24  6:27 am   are any of the videos you're currently working on related, as in, the same storyline? 

      not exactly

2.3.24  5:46 am   do you write or record a journal?

      could happen

2.3.24  4:17 am   What can two person do that is more intimate than having two matching pair of socks

      ah, this must be the underwear meme i've heard about

2.3.24  3:24 am   Hello Bill Wurtz the Majestic Musicer, the other day I asked you essentially "why is your music so good?" in essay form, and you answered "holy cannoli, ". May I please know what this means? 

      it was such an extremely high dosage of praise, ..... it's like when you are served a chocolate cake with the flavor multiplied by 10,0000. some form of exclamation would naturally follow

2.3.24  1:35 am   on a day when you don't feel like being productive or don't feel motivated, what do you do to spend your time? i don't mean just to bring motivation back, but mostly to just pass the time and still enjoy life =]

      i basically just keep trying to gradually learn everything

2.3.24  1:20 am   What existed of 987 in 2019?

      about 2 and a half bars of writing

2.3.24  12:53 am   Is love and healing the most fundamental solution to our society's problems?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.2.24  10:42 pm   should i stop hanging out with my friend? he seems on edge every time im with him, and when i ask him why he doesnt respond, i dont know whats wrong with him so thats why i need your help

      maybe wait a couple of days, then try again

2.2.24  10:19 pm   How was your day and what did you do?

      i've never been able to understand that question. use of 'was' makes it sound like the day is totally over. so i'd have to be asleep. but if i'm able to answer the question then my day is still going on

2.2.24  9:31 pm   How have more people written songs than me?

      that's only fair. other people are allowed to do it too

2.2.24  8:45 pm   do you enjoy a challenge?

      sometimes
